name: Disarm
description:
You try to knock something out of an opponent’s grasp. 
Attempt an Athletics check against the opponent’s Reflex DC.

effects.criticalSuccess:
You knock the item out of the opponent’s 
grasp. It falls to the ground in the opponent’s space.
effects.success:
You weaken your opponent’s grasp on the item. Until 
the start of that creature’s turn, attempts to Disarm the 
opponent of that item gain a +2 circumstance bonus, and 
the target takes a –2 circumstance penalty to attacks with 
the item or other checks requiring a firm grasp on the item.
effects.criticalFailure:
You lose your balance and become flat-footed 
until the start of your next turn.

rules:
You have at least one hand free. The target 
can’t be more than one size larger than you.
